thread.title: West Ham v Man City live score and goal updates
thread.title_full: West Ham v Man City live score and goal updates

author: Stuart Brennan
title: West Ham v Man City live score and goal updates
text:
Sport West Ham v Man City live score and goal updates West Ham v Manchester City - live updates from the London Stadium as Pep Guardiola's men aim to pick up three more points Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now West Ham v City: Preview Share this video Watch Next 
Pep Guardiola takes his Manchester City team back to the London Stadium less than a month after their 5-0 win the FA Cup. 
City are looking to make up ground on Premier League leaders Chelsea and fellow top four rivals Liverpool, Tottenham and Arsenal, who all dropped points on Tuesday night. 
Sergio Aguero is back in contention after missing Saturday's FA Cup fourth round win against Crystal Palace, while Fernandinho returns from his latest suspension. What TV channel is West Ham vs Man City on? 
West Ham vs Manchester City will be shown live on BT Sport 1 and BT Sport 1 HD from 7pm on Wednesday, February 1 2017 . 
Kick-off from the London Stadium is at 7:45pm . 
You can also follow all the action right here on our matchday blog. 18:00 
Here’s how our writers think City should line up tonight. 
Pep hasn’t got an easy job on his hands. 17:54 
Gabriel Jesus’ brother was on his way to London earlier today. 
Indication that he’s involved? Which we surely knew, question is, will he start? 17:45 
Look who’s supporting the Blues tonight. 17:42 
Pep’s got a hard task tonight. 
Who’s he going to start? Jesus? Aguero? Both? 
Just over an hour until we find out. Share
